title: Why am I getting secondary role for 80% of my games?
body: For two nights now I play 5 games and out of those 4 are my secondary roles. Wtf? Is there simply not enough people playing?

replies.body: And tonight I play 5 games without getting my primary role a single time. Ridiculous. This is the only game I know where it doesn't even let you play what you want.

Depends on what your roles are. Usually it's the opposite, there's too many people playing. It's school holidays atm so there are more people playing for longer. If your primary role is a popular one then the more people playing the worse the oversaturation of people trying to get that role, and the more likely you are to get your secondary, especially if you're secondary is a less popular role like support.

You saw that and it would seem obvious except for the fact that it has happened to me for the last couple of nights as well.
Except I primary support, secondary jungle and have had jungle 4/5 games.

Odd, I have thee same role prefs as you and have seen jungle once in the last month~. It's possible jungle popularity has sharply dropped off for some reason I'm not sure. I haven't been able to play much the last few days cause I've been working.
